name: Kyle Wallace
text: I love pizza hut! Some of the best pizza. The waiter here was great! Wished I had gotten her name to give her a shout out. Will definitely come back.

name: AM O
text: We always do delivery and so far drivers have been timely. Around 30-40 minutes and they are always courteous with food still being hot. Usually food is good and made correctly. Tonight they had an unlimited topping deal but I only wanted â€¦More

name: Hope Shing
text: Tyler is an amazing thoughtful server! I have a pepper allergy and he made me wings without sauce and he checked all of the salad dressing ingredients for me before bringing them out! He was so accommodating to allergies! He is an incredible server!

name: Angela Perrella
text: The Pizza, cheese sticks, & salad we're excellent. The ingredients for fresh and nothing was under or over-cooked. Our waitress was especially friendly helpful and attentive. I would come back just to have her service. I have worked in food â€¦More

name: Debbie Taylor
text: Place was empty, waiter had no clue what was going on, didn't bring out plates. Did not come back to refill drinks or ask how things were, will never come back to this pizza hut in gloversville...horrible service

name: Tami Michalek
text: My son loves this restaurant. His standard order, personal pan pepperoni and double order(10) cheese bread sticks. Used to pay $19.41. Which I thought was too high. Ordered today, $ 20.46. Told employee that I won't be ordering very often. Price increase and quality of food decrease- mot a good combination.

text: Staff was excellent there were only two on and they were getting hammered with orders and customers. They still kept their cool we're supper friendly and made our lunch date wonderful. Owner should appreciate them they did awesome.

text: I have been getting pizza and other menu items here for yearsss. My mom loves their food, and got me hooked as a child. The pizza is always fresh and hot, the desserts are delicious, wings are good, and staff is friendly and courteous

name: Jon Woodard
text: First time here, ordered pepperoni and onion, pepperoni and meatballs med. Pizzas bread sticks and a couple of 2ltr. Service was fast and employees were very friendly and helpful. The food dang some of the best Pizza Hut pizza I've had in a long time and for the price you just can't beat it. If ever in the area again I know were to eat.

text: Ordered delivery and I expected it to slightly chilled considering the drive but cold? The only thing hot was the wings sauce. I asked to replace the blue cheese with ranch and sure enough I got TWO blue cheese dips. I am starting to feel â€¦More
